title: 1945 Horror - Fog Island - No Escape: A Treasure Hunt Turned Trap

sources.title: 1945 Horror - Fog Island - No Escape: A Treasure Hunt Turned Trap
sources.description:
Leo Grainger (George Zucco) lures his scheming ex-partners to a fog-choked island, rigging his mansion with pirate traps for revenge. As greedy Alec Ritchfield (Lionel Atwill) and crew hunt hidden treasure, they find their fate involves secret passages and a very damp demise.

Alternative title: The Island of Revenge (1945)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/zAnbsQ9PyR4

Director: Terry O. Morse
Writers: Pierre Gendron (screenplay), Bernadine Angus (play Angel Island)
Cast: Lionel Atwill, George Zucco, Jerome Cowan, Sharon Douglas, Veda Ann Borg
Genres: Drama, Horror, Mystery, Romance, Thriller

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
